Language Processing and Python

This chapter explores the possibilities of combining simple programming techniques with large quantities of text, extracting key words and phrases, and using Python for natural language processing. It covers various topics such as linguistically motivated programming tasks, key programming concepts, and challenges in natural language processing.

Key Concepts:

  • language processing
  • text extraction
  • programming concepts
  • word usage analysis
  • text comparison
  • positional information
  • word dispersion
  • List operations
  • Indexing lists
  • Concatenation and appending
natural language processing Python text analysis monstrous common_contexts similar() dispersion plot lists concatenation appending
